name: parabank_last5
description: Overview - ParaBank is a demo site used for simulating a realistic online banking website ([link](https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/index.htm)). It has the following features :  1. Register 2. Login 3. Reset password 4. Open Account 5. Account Overview 6. Transfer funds 7. Bill pay 8. Search transactions 9. Loan Request 10. Update contact info
